cta.action: Try Bookingflix Premium for 14 days for free!

terminverwaltung-fuer-endkunden.intro: Your customers manage themselves completely in the customer portal. After registration and login, all booked appointments can be viewed clearly here. Customers can change and rate their appointments and contact you directly via the customer chat.

infos.headline: Book, change and cancel appointments
infos.text: Your customers no longer need to call to book, change or cancel an appointment. They do it themselves in the customer portal. That saves time and nerves for everyone.

infos.headline: QR code for each appointment
infos.text:
Bookingflix offers you an integrated check-in and check-out function. Each booked appointment has its own QR code and individual appointment ID. This make it possible to check each customer in and out within seconds.

This gives you an accurate overview of your customers' reliability, utilization and can even provide traceability for the health authorities if necessary.

infos.headline: Customer chat
infos.text: Use the integrated chat function to get in touch with your customers and vice versa via all end devices. The chat history is documented. You and your customers are informed of new messages by email.

infos.headline: Reminder of the appointment evaluation
infos.text: After the appointment has taken place, your customers are reminded to rate it. The ratings are then published in the customer portal. You can define yourself which evaluation questions you want to ask your customers.

infos.headline: More information about your business
infos.text: The Customer Portal provides your customers with all the important information about your business, such as opening hours, location, special offers and reviews. This information is taken from your Bookingflix account.

terminverwaltung-fuer-endkunden.subtitle: Appointment management for end customers
terminverwaltung-fuer-endkunden.title: Manage booked appointments and a place to contact you
